text:
🚨UPDATE: COVID-19 Treatments 

In today's episode, Dr. Auwaerter discusses the latest in #COVID19 treatments including #vaccine comparison (Moderna vs. BioNTech/Pfizer) and the guidelines, recommendations and efficacy data for Remdesivir & Baricitinib.

➡️https://t.co/02bkdOQcxg https://t.co/ZdjBtRK0zQ
